name: Zexal Construction
effectText:
Reveal 1 card in your hand, and if you do, add 1 of the following cards from your Deck to your hand, then shuffle the revealed card into the Deck.
●"ZW -" monster
●"ZS -" monster
●"Zexal" Spell/Trap
●"Rank-Up-Magic" Spell
●"Rank-Down-Magic" Spell
You can only activate 1 "Zexal Construction" per turn.
